Room.Name: Millwood Mayor's Office Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main hallway running through the Mayor's Office.
Room.LongDescription: The lavishly decorated hallway contains many portraits of the many mayors of Oceancrest, beginning with Millwood of Uxtiva. The halls are said to be haunted by the second-to-last Mayor of Oceancrest, also ironically named Millwood. It is also said that Millwood is a lich, and therefore no life insurance claims have been paid to his heirs, and will not be until he is proven to be dead. The office is pretty desolate now, and seems abandoned.
